text: Frankenstein is a 1931 horror movie. It was directed by James Whale. It is based on the book Frankenstein by Mary Shelley. The movie stars Colin Clive, Mae Clarke, John Boles, and Boris Karloff. The movie was a great success with both audiences and critics. It was followed by multiple sequels, including The Bride of Frankenstein and The Son of Frankenstein. ==References== ==Other websites== * Frankenstein (1931) at DBCult Film Institute * * * * * More Than the Sum of Its Parts: The Making of Frankenstein by Stephen Jacobs at Creativescreenwriting.com Category:1931 movies Category:Movies based on books Category:American horror movies Category:Black-and-white movies Category:United States National Film Registry movies Category:1930s horror movies Category:Frankenstein movies Category:Mad scientist movies Category:Monster movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies set in the Alps Category:Movies set in castles Category:Movies set in Bavaria Category:Movies set in Switzerland
title: Frankenstein (1931 movie)
